title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the Eclipse IDE, the behavior is unexpected. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new project and name it xxx. 2. In the package viewer, select a package in project A. 3. From the context menu, choose copy. 4.
OB: After selecting 'copy' from the context menu, the package should be successfully copied to the clipboard.
EB: After selecting 'copy' from the context menu, the package is not copied to the clipboard.
SR: Investigate the issue and fix the 'copy package' functionality in the Eclipse IDE to ensure that the package is successfully copied to the clipboard.
